name: DataLemur SQL
description: Free SQL practice with FAANG questions. Created by ex-Facebook authors of Ace the Data Science Interview.

name: StrataScratch
description: Company-specific SQL filtering for Airbnb, Uber, Netflix. Real interview questions with solutions.

name: Mode Analytics SQL Tutorial
description: Free tutorial with real datasets and the famous Yammer case study. Great for building fundamentals.

name: Window Functions Practice
description: Interactive quizzes on ROW_NUMBER, RANK, LAG/LEAD. Consistently tested in interviews.

name: Interview Query
description: Data science interview platform with SQL, Python, and ML questions. Take-home challenges included.

name: Nick Singh's 40 Stats Questions
description: Probability and statistics questions from FAANG and Wall Street. Bayesian puzzles and distributions.

name: StatQuest with Josh Starmer
description: Best resource for econ PhDs learning ML. Bias-variance, regularization, ensemble methods explained accessibly.

name: Trustworthy Online Controlled Experiments
description: The industry bible by Kohavi, Tang, Xu. Design, analysis, pitfalls from Microsoft/LinkedIn/Google leaders.

name: Understanding CUPED
description: Bridges CUPED to DiD and regression. Essential for industry A/B testing interviews.

name: Netflix: Quasi Experimentation
description: When A/B tests aren't feasible and how Netflix handles SUTVA violations.

name: Causal Inference: The Mixtape
description: Free book by Scott Cunningham. DAGs, DiD, RDD, synthetic control with code. Praised by Imbens and Abadie.

name: The Effect
description: Free causal inference book by Nick Huntington-Klein with animated visualizations.

name: Scarlet Chen: Econ PhD to Tech
description: Stanford PhD to Google/Shopify. Interview experiences at Google, Amazon, Facebook, Uber.

name: Emma Ding: Product Sense Guide
description: Ultimate guide to business case interviews. AARRR framework, metrics, diagnostic approaches.

name: Amplitude: North Star Metrics
description: Three games framework: Attention, Transaction, Productivity. Real examples from Facebook, Airbnb, Spotify.

name: DataLemur Meta DS Guide
description: 31 leaked Meta interview questions. Product sense and SQL focus.

name: Scarlet Ink: Amazon LP Guide
description: Written by ex-Amazon Bar Raiser. Sent by recruiters to candidates. 100+ candidates credit it for getting hired.

name: Amazon Leadership Principles
description: Official 16 principles with explanations. Customer Obsession, Ownership, Invent and Simplify, etc.

name: Interviewing.io Amazon Guide
description: Insights from 500+ mock Amazon behavioral interviews. STARI method with Action at 50-60%.

name: IGotAnOffer: Google Behavioral
description: Googleyness traits: comfort with ambiguity, bias for action, intellectual humility.

name: Designing Machine Learning Systems
description: Essential ML system design book by Chip Huyen. Based on Stanford CS 329S.

name: ML System Design Interview (Alex Xu)
description: 7-step framework with 10 detailed solutions: visual search, video recommendation, ad prediction.

name: ML Interviews GitHub
description: 7.2k stars. Created by someone with offers from Meta, Google, Amazon, Apple for Applied Scientist.

name: Chip Huyen ML Interviews Book
description: 200+ knowledge questions organized by difficulty for ML fundamentals.

name: Interview Query Take-Homes
description: 23 real take-home challenges from Airbnb, Stripe, Uber, DoorDash, Amazon with solutions.

name: Ace the Data Science Interview
description: 201 real questions from FAANG, startups, Wall Street. Industry-standard prep resource.

name: Rose Tan: Tech Jobs for Econ PhDs
description: LinkedIn guide on navigating tech's job market. Networking tips, role types, expectations.

name: Levels.fyi
description: Crowdsourced tech compensation data. Compare salaries across companies, levels, locations.

name: Levels.fyi Negotiation Guide
description: Guide on base, equity, bonus structures and how to negotiate each.

name: Candor Salary Negotiation
description: Strategies tech insiders use. Competing offers, leveling, avoiding leaving money on the table.
